messages.title: Moderate Conservatives Speak Out
messages.content: "I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would lend my vote to the Liberal Democrats" - Former Conservative Justice Secretary David Gauke 13/11/19, "I'm not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem" - Ken Clarke - Conservative MP for 50 years, "Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all of their candidates. Start the process of building something new" - Former Conservative Minister, Nick Boles, "Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit" - Former Conservative Deputy PM, Michael Heseltine

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dem Will wants to stop Brexit and then focus on issues that impact people every day.
He will invest in public services like the NHS and schools and fight climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can stop the Tory-Brexit Party in Woking. Woking result in the 2019 European Election: Lib Dem 36%, Brexit Party 28%, Con 11%, Lab 6%.

issues.brexitEurope: Can you trust Boris Johnson and his Conservative-Brexit Party?
issues.education: The Conservatives have cut funding from the NHS and schools. NHS waiting times are the worst ever and parents in Woking have even been asked to fund school equipment.
issues.health: He will invest in public services like the NHS. The Conservatives have cut funding from the NHS. NHS waiting times are the worst ever.

community.content: Will Forster is a former Mayor, local Councillor and life-long Woking resident.

leaflet.personalStatement: Will Forster is a former Mayor, local Councillor and life-long Woking resident. He has been a Councillor for the south Woking area for the last 10 years. Until mid-May, Will was Mayor of Woking, during which time he raised money for the local homeless shelter, the York Road Project.

personalStories.story: Will Forster is a former Mayor, local Councillor and life-long Woking resident. He has been a Councillor for the south Woking area for the last 10 years. Until mid-May, Will was Mayor of Woking, during which time he raised money for the local homeless shelter, the York Road Project.

examples: "I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would lend my vote to the Liberal Democrats" - Former Conservative Justice Secretary David Gauke 13/11/19
"I'm not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem" - Ken Clarke - Conservative MP for 50 years
"Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all of their candidates. Start the process of building something new" - Former Conservative Minister, Nick Boles
"Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit" - Former Conservative Deputy PM, Michael Heseltine
NHS waiting times are the worst ever and parents in Woking have even been asked to fund school equipment.
Boris Johnson and the Tories cannot be trusted.
The Conservatives have cut funding from the NHS and schools.
Can you trust Boris Johnson and his Conservative-Brexit Party?
Can you trust Boris Johnson and his Conservative-Brexit Party?
Woking's Tory MP campaigned for Leave and voted for a no deal Brexit, despite Woking voting Remain. He is out of touch with local people.
Boris Johnson and the Tories cannot be trusted.
